Name: Autumn Leaves
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
22.5 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
STRAIN into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Whiskey, apple brandy, vermouth and herbal liqueur combine delightfully in this autumnal cocktail.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2008 by Jeffrey Morgenthaler at Bel Ami Lounge in Eugene, Oregon. Jeffrey's recipe calls for 22.5ml (¾oz) Wild Turkey rye, 22.5ml (¾oz) Clear Creek apple brandy, 22.5ml (¾oz) Carpano Antica Formula , 7.5ml (¼oz) Strega and 2 dashes of his house made cinnamon tincture.
Nutrition: One serving of Autumn Leaves contains 159 calories
